Slug Pistol.description: Slug Pistol - A small handgun that fires slugs at high velocity.

Laser Rifle.description: Laser Rifle - A high-powered rifle that emits intense laser beams.

Plasma Blade.description: Plasma Blade - An energy-infused blade that slices through enemies with plasma energy.

Sniper Rifle.description: Sniper Rifle - A long-range precision rifle designed for accurate headshots.

Grenade Launcher.description: Grenade Launcher - A weapon that launches explosive grenades at enemies.

Shock Baton.description: Shock Baton - A melee weapon that delivers electrical shocks to stun opponents.

Graviton Hammer.description: Graviton Hammer - A heavy hammer that generates gravitational fields to pulverize enemies.

Flechette Pistol.description: Flechette Pistol - A pistol that fires small darts with deadly precision.

EMP Grenade.description: EMP Grenade - A grenade that disables electronics in its blast radius.

Plasma Caster.description: Plasma Caster - A weapon that harnesses plasma energy to project deadly bolts of plasma.

Sonic Disruptor.description: Sonic Disruptor - A device that emits sonic waves to disrupt and damage enemies.

Railgun.description: Railgun - A powerful electromagnetic rifle that launches projectiles at hypersonic speeds.

Power Gauntlet.description: Power Gauntlet - An arm-mounted device that delivers kinetic impacts to crush opponents.

Plasma Pistol.description: Plasma Pistol - A pistol that shoots intense plasma bolts to melt through armor.

Neural Disruptor.description: Neural Disruptor - A weapon that disrupts neural functions of enemies to disable them.

Vibroblade.description: Vibroblade - A melee weapon with a vibrating blade that slices through enemies with precision.

Particle Beam Rifle.description: Particle Beam Rifle - A high-energy rifle that fires particle beams with devastating effect.

Plasma Grenade.description: Plasma Grenade - A grenade that releases a powerful plasma explosion upon detonation.

Arc Pistol.description: Arc Pistol - A pistol that shoots electric arcs to shock and damage targets.

Gravity Snare.description: Gravity Snare - A device that generates gravitational fields to immobilize and constrain enemies.

Vortex Cannon.description: Vortex Cannon - A weapon that fires projectiles generating vortexes that suck in and damage enemies.

Railcannon.description: Railcannon - An advanced railgun that fires high-velocity projectiles with tremendous force.

Phase Blade.description: Phase Blade - A blade with phase-shifting technology to pass through defenses and cut enemies.

Fusion Pistol.description: Fusion Pistol - A pistol that fires fusion bolts to unleash powerful atomic fusion explosions.

Plasma Lance.description: Plasma Lance - A long melee weapon that produces intense plasma energy to burn through enemies.

Disintegration Ray.description: Disintegration Ray - A weapon that emits a ray of energy to disintegrate organic matter.

Particle Carbine.description: Particle Carbine - A compact rifle that fires particle bursts with impressive accuracy.

Arc Thrower.description: Arc Thrower - A device that releases electric arcs to electrocute and damage enemies.

Ion Blaster.description: Ion Blaster - A blaster that fires ionized projectiles to disrupt and damage electronic systems.

Neutron Laser.description: Neutron Laser - An advanced laser weapon that emits neutron beams to melt through defenses.

Solar Torpedoes.description: Solar Torpedoes - Torpedoes armed with concentrated solar energy to unleash searing heat upon impact.

Quantum Disruptors.description: Quantum Disruptors - Weapons that manipulate quantum particles to disrupt enemy ship systems.

Ion Pulse Cannons.description: Ion Pulse Cannons - Cannons that emit powerful ion pulses to disable enemy ship electronics.

Plasma Torpedo Launchers.description: Plasma Torpedo Launchers - Launchers that fire torpedoes armed with devastating plasma warheads.

Disintegration Beams.description: Disintegration Beams - Beams of energy that cause organic matter to disintegrate upon contact.

Phaser Arrays.description: Phaser Arrays - Arrays of phaser emitters that release powerful beams of coherent light.

Anti-Proton Projectors.description: Anti-Proton Projectors - Projectors that fire anti-proton beams to annihilate enemy ship matter.

Magnetic Railcannons.description: Magnetic Railcannons - Railcannons that use magnetic fields to accelerate projectiles to incredible speeds.

Graviton Pulse Generators.description: Graviton Pulse Generators - Generators that emit pulses of gravitons to disrupt enemy ship movements.

Particle Disruptor Arrays.description: Particle Disruptor Arrays - Arrays of particle disruptor emitters that disrupt enemy ship systems.

Fusion Warhead Missiles.description: Fusion Warhead Missiles - Missiles armed with fusion warheads that release destructive energy upon detonation.

Plasma Lance Cannons.description: Plasma Lance Cannons - Cannons that project intense beams of plasma energy to pierce enemy ship defenses.

Electromagnetic Pulse Generators.description: Electromagnetic Pulse Generators - Generators that emit electromagnetic pulses to disable enemy ship electronics.

Neutron Beam Cannons.description: Neutron Beam Cannons - Cannons that fire beams of neutron particles to penetrate enemy ship defenses.

Solar Flare Missiles.description: Solar Flare Missiles - Missiles armed with concentrated solar flares to unleash blinding heat and radiation.

Quantum Destabilizers.description: Quantum Destabilizers - Weapons that generate quantum instabilities to disrupt enemy ship systems.

Ion Pulse Generators.description: Ion Pulse Generators - Generators that emit powerful ion pulses to disable enemy ship electronics.
